data.name: Successor
data.detailed_description:
Join us at Discord


About the Game

Successor plays at a brisk pace combining fast phased action with strategical depth. To reach the king's castle, you must carve a path conquering some of its many regions. You explore the lands to become stronger and learn about your enemies whom you battle at small diorama boards together with a selection of your acquired heroes. Choose carefully between your battles, as you risk losing everything.

Features

Play as one of three Lords, each with their own background story and unique attributes unlocking new game elements in the campaign.

Regions are procedurally generated and divided into territories populated with hostile factions, offering you a new experience every time you revisit them.

Out and indoor diorama battle boards loaded with environmental elements that can be used as tactical force modifiers.

Combat is Real-time with FULL tactical pause where you assign and stack commands to your units and accordingly watch them come alive to crush the enemy in real-time.

data.short_description: As one of three Lords, you set out to conquest the exotic regions of the Kingdom. Engage in Real-Time with Pause, Rogue-lite battles. Explore the lands for heroes and reap its mystical artifacts to defeat anyone that stands in your way of becoming the Successor.
